meanings.sent1: Every morning, she ritualises her morning routine by lighting a scented candle.
meanings.sent2: The priest ritualises the ceremony by chanting ancient prayers.
meanings.sent3: The cat ritualises its mealtime by meowing loudly until it gets its food.
meanings.sent4: The team ritualises their pre-game huddle, creating a sense of unity and focus.
meanings.sent5: The dancer ritualises her warm-up routine, ensuring she is ready for the performance.

meanings.definition: To make something into a ritual.
meanings.sent1: She ritualises her skincare routine by following the same steps every night.
meanings.sent2: The family ritualises Sunday brunch by always going to the same restaurant.
meanings.sent3: He ritualises his morning coffee by using the same mug every day.
meanings.sent4: The artist ritualises her painting process, starting with a specific color palette each time.
meanings.sent5: The students ritualise their study sessions by always meeting at the library.
